snippet.title: SNES Longplay [602] 3x3 Eyes: Juuma Houkan (Part 1 of 2)
snippet.description:
http://www.longplays.org

Played by: FudgyDRS

This is a single player platforming game where you play as Yakumo from the manga 3x3 Eyes as you aid your friends and save the world from evil.

Each stage plays out like a typical RPG and you need to speak to the citizens in some cases to figure out what to do. In addition, you will fight monsters roaming about and boss battles and solve various puzzles. 

During boss battles you have seven options (left to right):
Claw, Shield, Board, Horn, Jump, Attack, Block -
Disclaimer: Most videos by World of Longplays use SaveStates!
